creditline: Gift of Sandra J. Seibert in memory of her niece Beth Seibert
description: red interior; irridescent exterior; brownish spots; green rim
text: Chihuly’s popular Macchia series is named for the word for “spotted” in Italian. Each sculpture is formed from a unique combination of colors and topped with a colorful "lip wrap." Sandra Seibert won this studio edition piece in a raffle at the 18th Annual Antiques Show and Sale benefiting the Institute’s department of Decorative Arts, Sculpture and Architecture.
title: Brilliant Ruby Macchia with Green Lip Wrap
